title: Fed Official Lael Brainard Says Labor Market, Inflation Can Return to Pre-Pandemic Equilibrium
sub_head: Fed governor plays down concerns that pandemic has permanently reduced the availability of workers
body:
ARLINGTON, Va.â€”A top Federal Reserve official said that the economy was likely to make a complete recovery from the coronavirus and warned against prematurely concluding that the central bank needed to raise interest rates.
Fed governor Lael Brainard, a top contender to become chairwoman of the central bank next year, pushed back against concerns that inflation might soon accelerate because of difficulties hiring workers.
